alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 02 at 4:46PM EST until January 02 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EST FOR DODGE...SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI AND NORTHWESTERN WILCOX COUNTIES... At 446 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eastman, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Abbeville, Pineview, Rhine, Chauncey, Union, Dubois, Gresston, Plainfield, Empire, Yonkers, Cedar Creek, Roddy, Pope City, Ocmulgee Banks, Finleyson, Jay Bird Springs, Five Points, Achord and Godwinsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
